attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Part of my active citizenship project my group have decided to start a petition on the unfair fares students have to pay on the trains. Also the annoying fact of the barriers being open even though you have bought a ticket. Please help us in our campaign for cheapers fair for students

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
